response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you receive unparalleled quality and benefits. We are confident that you will find immense value in this product, just as it has done for us. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
